# Neblina Digital Inc.

> Neblina is a digital product studio based in Ontario, Canada. We help brands find clarity through product strategy, design, and privacy-first software development. Neblina means "mist" in Portuguese â€” representing the journey from uncertainty to clarity.

## About
- Founded by Gabriela Moreira, a product designer and software developer
- Based in Ontario, Canada
- Incorporated as Neblina Digital Inc.
- Dual model: consulting services + proprietary products

## Services
- Product Strategy & Brand Consulting
- Product Design & Creative Direction
- Mobile App Development (React Native, Expo, iOS)
- Technical Architecture & Implementation (Next.js, Supabase, TypeScript)
- Privacy-First Software Design

## Products
- Discloser (https://discloser.app): A privacy-first iOS app for anonymous sharing of health test results. Features AI-powered document verification, QR code sharing, and secure result management.

## Values
- Privacy is a fundamental right, not a feature
- Technology should empower people, not exploit them
- Trust is earned through transparency and action
- Intentional design over trend-chasing
- Quality code that stands the test of time

## Contact
- Website: https://neblina.tech
- Location: Ontario, Canada
